# Image Assets for Review Management

The following image assets are needed for the ReviewManagement component:

## Required Assets

1. **star_icon.png** - A gold/yellow filled star icon
2. **star_dull_icon.png** - A gray/dull empty star icon
3. **loader.gif** - A loading spinner animation

## How to Create These Assets

### Option 1: Download Free Icons

You can download these assets from free icon sites:

- [Flaticon](https://www.flaticon.com/search?word=star)
- [Iconfinder](https://www.iconfinder.com/search?q=star)
- [Icons8](https://icons8.com/icons/set/star)

For the loader.gif, search for "loading spinner gif" on:
- [Loading.io](https://loading.io/)
- [Giphy](https://giphy.com/search/loading-spinner)

### Option 2: Create SVG Star Icons

You can create star icons by saving the following SVG code as .svg files and then converting them to PNG:

For star_icon.png (filled star):
```svg
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path fill="#FFD700" d="M12 17.27L18.18 21l-1.64-7.03L22 9.24l-7.19-.61L12 2 9.19 8.63 2 9.24l5.46 4.73L5.82 21z"/>
</svg>
```

For star_dull_icon.png (empty star):
```svg
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  <path fill="#D3D3D3" d="M12 17.27L18.18 21l-1.64-7.03L22 9.24l-7.19-.61L12 2 9.19 8.63 2 9.24l5.46 4.73L5.82 21z"/>
</svg>
```

To convert SVG to PNG:
1. Create files with the SVG code above
2. Use online converters like [SVG to PNG](https://svgtopng.com/) or tools like Inkscape

### Option 3: Base64 Image Solution

As a temporary solution, you can modify the component to use Base64 encoded images directly:

1. Edit the `ReviewManagement.jsx` file
2. Replace the imports with inline Base64 images

Example modification:
```jsx
// Replace these imports:
// import star_icon from '../../assets/star_icon.png';
// import star_dull_icon from '../../assets/star_dull_icon.png';
// import loader from '../../assets/loader.gif';

// With these constants:
const star_icon = "data:image/png;base64,";

const star_dull_icon = "data:image/png;base64,";

const loader = "data:image/gif;base64,
